short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your life easier using this addon. This will remove all Risk Reminders for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of those pesky Risk Reminders on Hoobuy product pages? This addon seamlessly removes all Risk Reminder overlays for you, providing a cleaner and more efficient browsing experience. Plus, access a quick link to Hoofinds right from the extension popup for more shopping ease!
